text: IFN - γ - producing T cells were measured using ELISPOT assays ( Elispot kit for mouse IFN - γ , MABTECH , Germany ) following the manufacturer ' s instructions . Briefly , 1 × 10 6 splenocytes were seeded in 96 - well plates ( Sarstedt , Nürnbrecht , Germany ) and stimulated with peptide pools or individual peptides ( 2 µg peptide / mL RPMI 1640 medium ) at 37 • C for 48 h . Non - stimulated cells and cells treated with phorbol myristate acetate ( PMA ) ( SIGMA - ALDRICH ) and ionomycin ( SIGMA - ALDRICH , Taufkirchen , Germany ) or MVA F2L [ 26 ] [ 27 ] [ 28 ] [ 29 ] [ 30 ] [ 31 ] [ 32 ] [ 33 ] [ 34 ] peptide ( F2L , SPGAAGYDL , Thermo Fisher Scientific , Planegg , Germany ) [ 49 ] served as negative and positive controls , respectively . Automated ELISPOT plate reader software ( A . EL . VIS Eli . Scan , A . EL . VIS ELISPOT Analysis Software , Hannover , Germany ) was used to count and analyze spots .
